definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Hereditary breast cancer commonly occurs in premenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 遗传性乳癌通常发生于绝经前妇女。

sentences.english: How to treat transmissibility gastric disease?
Night terrors are an inherited problem and occur in about 2% of children.
sentences.chinese: 夜惊是遗传性的，约2%的孩子会有夜惊问题。

sentences.english: Scientists have been gradually unravelling the genetic nature of kidney cancer for years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，科学家们逐渐解开了肾癌基因的遗传性之谜。

sentences.english: How we choose to express those genetics is completely up to us.
sentences.chinese: 我们怎们能完全地把这些遗传性全都表达出来呢？

sentences.english: Most men are genetically predisposed to male pattern baldness.
sentences.chinese: 很多男人是遗传性的易患男性模式脱发。

sentences.english: These are inherent and apparently permanent and can be propagated vegetatively.
sentences.chinese: 这些具有内在的和明显的遗传性，并可以无性繁殖。

sentences.english: Does this student have hereditary disease or chronic disease?
sentences.chinese: 该生有何遗传性疾病或慢性病？

sentences.english: This tendency to develop hirsutism is genetic but the cause is not known.
sentences.chinese: 倾向于是遗传性发育但病因未明。

sentences.english: Objective To search responsible nuclear genes for matrilineal non-syndromic deafness.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索与母系遗传性非综合征性耳聋相关的核基因。

sentences.english: Task 1. Genetic analysis of inheritance of seed coat colour in Phaseolus vulgaris L.
sentences.chinese: 实作一，对菜豆种皮颜色的遗传性状进行分析。

sentences.english: Who has transmissibility the remedial method of ulcer of chronic oral cavity?
sentences.chinese: 谁有遗传性慢性口腔溃疡的治疗方法？

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the clinical feature of children hereditary spherocytosis (HS).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析儿童遗传性球形红细胞增多症的临床特点。

sentences.english: In very rare cases a dog can look like a non-Merle, while he is genetically a merle ("Phantom merle").
sentences.chinese: 在很少的例子时，一些遗传性的陨石看不出它是陨石。

sentences.english: Technology does not consist merely of gadgets and machines, or seeds and genetic traits.
sentences.chinese: 技术并不仅仅有装置和机械或者种子与遗传性状组成。

sentences.english: Endurance is a supper-dominant character controlled by genes not less than two.
sentences.chinese: 耐受性是一种遗传性性状，由遗传基因控制。

definition: heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
